short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension blocks websites for a certain period

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can be used to block distracting/unwanted websites. It uses local storage for saving time. In case you want to block websites in incognito mode, you can enable "allow in incognito" setting in this extension's settings.
